title: The I Just Made it to X with X Days Left in the Season Club.
body:
I just made it to Diamond with 14 days left in the season. 

**Has anyone else succeeded in their grind against the clock?**

Also, what champs did you play in series to get there:

{{champion:245}} loss {{champion:99}} win  {{champion:154}} win  {{champion:99}} win

replies.body:
Good job =)

Yeah i made it to gold again the other day:) 

Time to play Halo 5 now =D

Nice work!

Just in time for all the new games coming out over these next few months.
Yeah like preseason 6 League of Legends. Totally new game I swear!
Not gonna make it into master due to Riots shit client crashing 24/7.
